issue.title: pikabu.ru & фильтры для adguard 2.12.250
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

2.12.250

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pikabu.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter, RU AdList - Counters

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Есть старый смарт на 4.2 с adguard 2.12.250 (как оно там работает - отдельная история, речь не про это), где новые фильтры уже не катят. Можно ли какими-то костылями там заблокировать рекламу ? Сам ресурс, что характерно, грузится быстро, но прогружающиеся постфактум рекламные блоки могут намертво повесить браузер, пока прогружаются. За точность указанного списка фильтров не ручаюсь, но используются подписки *_optimized.txt под индексами 1 - 4, 11, 14, 15 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![SNAGIT_2024 03 07_17 23 14](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/12525093/e15334ff-aaf8-47e0-9356-79dcb3e8c069)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Update YouTube rules for tracking URL parameters

comment.body: We do not remove parameter just because doing so does not break the site. `embeds_widget_referrer` and `embeds_referring_euri` look to be trackparam, but I'm not sure about `source_ve_path` and `bp`.

labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

comment.body:
@MadeByPP CoreLib 버그 같아서 열었습니다.
임시 방편이 필요하시다면, AdGuard 설정 -> 네트워크 -> HTTPS 예외 리스트에 `library.inhatc.ac.kr` 도메인을 추가해주세요.

commits.message: https://www.ramahdarom.org/join-our-team/ - content below the fold disappears/clicking section titles doesn't work
